```{mermaid}
classDiagram
    Instance --> InstanceSettings
    Instance --> InstanceAPI
    InstanceAPI --> InstanceSettings
    Instance --> Module
    Module --> Model
    Model --> Field
    Field --> Record
    


    class InstanceSettings{
        +initialize(String url)
    }
    class InstanceAPI{
        +initialize(InstanceSettings instance_settings)
    }
    class Instance{
        -API api
        -Dict schema
        +Module[] module
        +initialize(InstanceSettings instance_settings)
    }
    class Module{
        +String name
        +Model[] models
        +initialize(Dict module_schema)
    }
    class Model{
        +String name
        +Bool is_link_table
        +Field[] fields
        +initialize(Module module, Dict model_schema)
    }
    class Field{
        +Model model
        +String type
        +String field_name
        +String model_name
        +...
        +initialize(Model model, Dict field_schema)
    }
    class Record{
        -Field field
        -Dict data
        +initialize(Field field, Dict data)
        +to_string()
        +print()
        +get_value(String field_name)
        +set_value(String field_name, Any value)
        +...fields...
    }
```
